entry.title: tanujnotes/Olauncher
entry.summary:
Minimal AF launcher app for Android. Available at F-Droid and Play Store.

Olauncher | Minimal AF

Olauncher is a minimal AF launcher app for Android with daily new wallpaper. AF stands for ad-free. :)

Install

Install from F-Droid or Play Store or download the APK from latest release.

You can also clone the master branch and build the app yourself in Android Studio. No extra steps required.

Contribute

  • Please go through the issues marked as bug or enhancement
  • Please let's discuss before sending pull requests
  • Make pull requests to master branch

Sponsor

Support Olauncher - https://buymeacoff.ee/tanujnotes

More options -
  • Etheruem: 0xcBb95AF4D76fba34bf8D1808905BF5365239E2ba
  • Bitcoin: 33VFtQSa6HZr2FZphmNA5jZ9fEKPNbeEmL
  • Monero: 46bCqsiEtqj4p48HbQjw4c6RVtWeN59Uy4NBGGferBe7HEFKoskBbouFuuTxKvhTXhNuXQbLiEUFCaeMDTrfBGK7Qhp3dRn
  • Amazon affiliate: amzn.to/3uftwFW
  • Paypal: paypal.me/tanujnotes
  • UPI: tanujnotes@upi

License - GNU GPLv3

Contact - @tanujnotes

Thank you and have a great day!

P.S. Checking out our About page in Olauncher settings is highly recommended.
